apiDescription: Note that RHS is Self by default, but this is not mandatory. For example, std::time::SystemTime implements Add<Duration>, which permits operations of the form SystemTime = SystemTime + Duration.
examples:
Here is an example of the same Point struct implementing the Add trait
using generics.

trait required methods.name: [+] Expand attributes#[must_use] fn add(self, rhs: RHS) -> Self::Output
